html:
Key Features 

  • Software: Novomatic 
  • Reels: 5 
  • Paylines: 10 
  • Max. of coins: 100 per line 
  • Jackpot: 900 coins per line 
  • Minimum bet: $0.02 
  • Maximum bet: $45 
  • Auto Play: Available 

Theme & Design 

If you're a nostalgic fan of old land-based slot games, if you love games without any special effects and that go straight to the point, Lucky Lady's Charm is the slot for you! 

The theme is that of Lady Luck, and the symbols can only be good luck amulets. The graphics are stripped down to the bare essentials. Don't expect spectacular visuals, 3-D animations or impressive soundtracks. In this slot game what matters is the gameplay on a simple screen that leaves no room for distractions. 

Symbols, Wild & Scatter 

Consistent with the theme, you can find all sorts of good luck charms among the symbols: horseshoes, shamrocks, ladybugs, rabbit's feet and the Lucky Lady, the charming girl who will increase your winnings and is the Wild symbol. 5 Lucky Ladies give you a chance to get the maximum win of 900 coins per line. Inevitable then is the Scatter, in this case a crystal ball, which if it appears 3 times gives access to the Free Spins Feature with as many as 15 free spins - in which the winnings get a 3x boost. 

The symbols with the lowest value are classic playing cards, from 9 to Ace.  J, 10 and Q pay if they appear 5x on a winning line, A and K multiply the value of the bet when they appear on the reels 3x and up, while 9 allows for a small win even when we find it on the reels only twice. 

Versatile & Fun Game 

Lucky Lady's Charm, a flagship of Germany's Novomatic, is almost a must for those new to the world of slot games. 

People like this slot so much because it has an intuitive game mechanism, great versatility in wagering and an eye-catching Las Vegas style! 

It’s suitable for different game modes. Beginners can start with wagers from the minimum value of $0.01, while more experienced players can go up to a maximum of $45. 

With Lucky Lady's Charm, you can relive the engaging and colorful atmospheres of the old land-based game rooms from the comfort of your couch at home! 

Alternative Slots to Lucky Lady's Charm 

As you could imagine, the theme of luck holds a prominent place when talking about a game based essentially on luck itself. Therefore, there are several software providers that have proposed slots of this type in their catalog - very similar to each other in terms of graphics and content. 

A take on the Goddess of Fortune theme that will make you smile as you try to win is Rise of Merlin. This slot from Play N GO offers fortune and wizardry as themes, boasting a 94.51% RTP, an interesting 5x3 layout, 10 paylines, and some special features like expanding symbols and a Free Spins feature. 

[faq group="Lucky Lady's Charm" open="true" title=" Frequently Asked Questions "]
meta_title: Lucky Lady’s Charm Slot Review | Lucky Lady’s Charm Review
meta_desc: Find out if Novomatic was able to charm our slot experts with Lucky Lady’s Charm. Here’s our Lucky Lady’s Charm review  for the best US casinos.
